sentences.eng: Yesterday I learnt that I'm a mumbler.

sentences.eng: But how did I realize this?

sentences.eng: I made a report a week ago.

sentences.eng: Everything went well and I was pleased with myself.
sentences.rus: Все прошло хорошо, и я была довольна собой.

sentences.rus: А вчера я стала делать [стенограмму|стенограмма|a transcript].

sentences.eng: I was very surprised!

sentences.eng: It turns out that I speak quietly and unclearly.

sentences.eng: And I often rush and swallow the end of words.

sentences.eng: I was talking

sentences.eng: and everybody was listening to me with interest and attention.
sentences.rus: а все слушали с интересом и [вниманием|внимание|an attention].

sentences.rus: Но теперь я пересматриваю [запись|запись|a record] и вижу:
